pointt_oauth.title: Bosch IVT AIR (K30) - OAuth2 Cloud Configuration
pointt_oauth.description:
Configure your Bosch IVT AIR (K30 RF module) for cloud-based control via OAuth2.

To obtain your OAuth tokens:
1. Run the OAuth setup script: https://github.com/deric/bosch-thermostat-client-python/blob/k30/examples/pointtapi_oauth_setup.py
2. The script will guide you through the authentication process
3. Copy the device ID, access token, and refresh token from the generated tokens.json file

error.invalid_oauth_tokens: Invalid OAuth tokens. Please provide valid access token and refresh token.
